channel.title: 0mfg, cmon! someone knows how to add safezones, so come on, help!
channel.description:
IM GOING TO POST IN ALL CAPS FOR 1 REASON:
NOONE IS HELPING, BUT I KNOW SOMEONE KOWNS HOW TO ADD SAFEZONES, AND IT PISSES ME OFF BECAUSE YOU WON'T HELP.
I'M USING PROJECT 16 SOURCE, SO PLEASE FRIKIN HELP! (PLUS, I HAVE CORDS OF THE AREA.)

item.title: 0mfg, cmon! someone knows how to add safezones, so come on, help!
item.dc:creator: @x_rush_x x rush x
item.description:
@x_rush_x wrote:

search in client.java for

public boolean nonWild() {

you will see this.

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= #### && absY <= #### && absX <= #### && absX >= ####) return true; else return false; }
if (absY >= #### && absY <= #### && absX <= #### && absX >= ####)
                     sw                           ne                    sw                        ne

sw = south,west - put south west corner here

ne = north,east - put north east here

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: 0mfg, cmon! someone knows how to add safezones, so come on, help!

item.title: 0mfg, cmon! someone knows how to add safezones, so come on, help!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Put that if in the checkwildy() and checkwildy2() voids. In the If put inwildy = false for checkwildy(), and inwildy2 = false for checkwildy2()

And seriously if you know the answer help someone, everyone is a newbie when they start out, no one should have to type IN ALL CAPS just to get noticed! :mad:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Morgarath, post:1, topic:117464”]IM GOING TO POST IN ALL CAPS FOR 1 REASON:

NOONE IS HELPING, BUT I KNOW SOMEONE KOWNS HOW TO ADD SAFEZONES, AND IT PISSES ME OFF BECAUSE YOU WON’T HELP.

I’M USING PROJECT 16 SOURCE, SO PLEASE FRIKIN HELP! (PLUS, I HAVE CORDS OF THE AREA.)[/quote]

Maybe your attitude stops people from helping you. Give me a minute and i’ll post what you need.

            sw                 ne                sw                 ne      

if((absX >= 2897 && absX <= 2889  && absY >=9698  && absY <= 9690 ))

sw = SouthWest
ne = NorthEast
